title: Isla Fisher shows off her spot-on eye for style as she heads out to lunch in red polka dot blouse
text:
Isla Fisher has been known to stun on many a red carpet as the red-headed bombshell she is.

She cut a cute and casual look in red Thursday as she met a friend for lunch at Il Pastaio in Beverly Hills.

The 43-year-old donned a red polka-dotted blouse with billowy sleeves and a waist-length pussy bow tied at the neck.
